roleset.name: make shorter, especially words
roleset.note: ABBREVIATE-V NOTES: Created by Claire (from abbreviate.01-v)
ABBREVIATION-N NOTES: Based on Stratified data. Comparison to abbreviate.01. Abbreviate.01 is a member of VN class other_cos-45.4. No FN class. Framedby Katie. (from abbreviation.01-n)

role.descr: EXT, arg1 is shortened by how much?
start state of arg 1, original word when separate mention
end state of arg1, new abbreviation

example.name: Passive
example.text: He secretly planned and founded the "Palestinian National Liberation Movement," abbreviated *none* the "FATAH."

example.name: almost all args
example.text: His abbreviation of urethral catheter out to UCO was confused for urinary catheter out.
